data.meta_description: Wind and solar energy lessons and workshops for science classrooms. The KidWind Challenge, a student driven renewable energy design competition.
data.text: For the last 15 years KidWind has been focused on teaching the world about renewable energy. We have helped thousands of educators bring wind and solar power to life in the classroom, guided by its award winning curriculum, its unique tools and kits, and a deep passion for the subject matter. Learn more
